divs: Sighting DetailsWe were having an outside fireplace going on and my sister and I noticed an orange light in the sky, matter of fact 2 orange lights in the sky.We watched them until they became smaller and disappeared. This happened around 930 pm.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Watertown
There were no other sightings in Watertown on or around September 21st 2012
